auth.username_hint: Username must be unique and will be used for login.
auth.password_hint_simple: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers.
auth.reset_password_info: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.invalid_link_info: The password reset link you clicked is invalid or has expired.

settings.title: Warracker - Settings
settings.dark_mode_desc: Switch between light and dark theme
settings.default_view_desc: Choose your preferred view for warranties
settings.currency_symbol_desc: Choose the symbol to display for prices
settings.currency_position_desc: Choose whether currency symbol appears on the left or right of numbers
settings.expiring_soon_days_desc: Number of days before expiration to show warnings
settings.notification_channel_desc: Choose how you want to receive notifications
settings.notification_frequency_desc: How often to receive email notifications
settings.apprise_frequency_desc: How often to receive Apprise notifications
settings.apprise_timezone_desc: Your local timezone for Apprise notifications
settings.delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your account and all data
settings.oidc_sso_desc: Allow users to log in via an OIDC provider.
settings.oidc_only_mode_desc: Hide traditional username/password login form and only allow OIDC login. Warning: Ensure OIDC is properly configured before enabling this option.
settings.oidc_provider_name_desc: Internal name for the OIDC client (e.g., 'oidc').
settings.client_secret_desc: Sensitive value. Stored in the database. An application restart is required for changes to take effect.
settings.issuer_url_desc: The base URL of your OIDC provider.
settings.oidc_restart_message: Application restart is required for OIDC settings to take full effect.
settings.time_of_day_notification: Time of day to receive notifications (in 24-hour format)
settings.paperless_ngx_about_desc: This optional feature allows you to store warranty documents in your self-hosted Paperless-ngx instance instead of locally. When enabled, users can choose where to store each document: locally or in Paperless-ngx.
settings.paperless_ngx_desc: Configure integration with Paperless-ngx document management system
settings.paperless_url_desc: Base URL of your Paperless-ngx instance
settings.paperless_token_desc_generate: Generate an API token from your Paperless-ngx instance (Settings → API Tokens).
settings.paperless_view_in_app_desc: Open documents within the app instead of in a new tab
settings.apprise_desc: Configure Apprise for advanced notification delivery to multiple services
settings.apprise_desc_system_wide: Enable or disable Apprise notifications system-wide
settings.apprise_not_available_desc: The Apprise notification library is not installed or available. Notification features are disabled.
settings.apprise_mode_desc: Choose when to send Apprise notifications
settings.apprise_warranty_scope_desc: Choose which warranties to include in notifications
settings.apprise_notification_days_desc: Days before expiration to send notifications (comma-separated, e.g., "7,30" for 7 days and 30 days before)
settings.apprise_check_frequency_desc: How often the system checks for expiring warranties (global setting)
settings.apprise_title_prefix_desc: Prefix added to notification titles (e.g., "[Warracker]" results in "[Warracker] Warranties Expiring Soon")
settings.apprise_test_url_desc: Optional: URL for sending test notifications only (won't be saved to main configuration)
settings.apprise_supported_services_desc: Apprise supports 80+ notification services including: Discord, Slack, Telegram, Email (Gmail, Outlook), Webhooks, Microsoft Teams, Matrix, Pushover, Ntfy, Gotify, and many more.
settings.view_full_list_of_supported_services: View Full List of Supported Services
settings.transfer_ownership_warning: Transfer application ownership to another admin user. This action is irreversible.
settings.transfer_ownership_desc: Once ownership is transferred, you will become a regular admin and the new owner will have ultimate control over the application.
settings.select_new_owner: Select New Owner (must be an admin)
settings.transfer_ownership_confirmation: You are about to transfer application ownership to
settings.transfer_ownership_consequence_1: You will become a regular admin
settings.transfer_ownership_consequence_2: The new owner will have ultimate control over the application
settings.transfer_ownership_consequence_3: Only the new owner can transfer ownership again
settings.transfer_ownership_type_to_confirm: To confirm, please type "TRANSFER" in the field below:

status.title: Status - Warracker
status.recent_expirations_empty: No recently expired or expiring warranties.

about.title: About - Warracker
about.description: A comprehensive warranty management system designed to help you track, organize, and manage all your product warranties in one secure, user-friendly platform.
about.project_description: Warracker is an open-source warranty management system built with modern web technologies. It provides a secure and intuitive way to manage product warranties, track expiration dates, and organize important documents.
about.community_description: Join our community for support, discussions, and updates. Report bugs, request features, or get help from other users and contributors.
about.developer_description: Warracker is developed and maintained by Sassanix. The project is open-source and welcomes contributions from the community.
about.support_description: If you find Warracker useful, consider supporting its development!
about.latest_version: You are using the latest version
